apps.linear
Class ExpenseList

java.lang.Object
  apps.linear.ExpenseList

public class ExpenseList
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements an unordered list of expenses. Each item in the list is an Expense instance.

Author:
Sesh Venugopal

Field Summary
(package private)  List<Expense> expenses
          List component, instantiated with Expense type, to store expenses.

          Initializes this expense list to empty.

Tells whether this list contains a given expense or not.

Parameters:

clear

public void clear()
Empties this list by removing all expenses.

remove

public void remove(Expense exp)
Removes a given expense from this list.

Parameters:
exp - Expense to be removed.
Throws:
NoSuchElementException - If the given expense does not exist in this list.

first

public Expense first()
Returns the first expense in this list.

Returns:
First expense in this list, null if list is empty.

next

public Expense next()
Returns the next expense in this list, relative to a previous call to first( ) or next( ).
To iterate over all expenses in this list, there must be a call to first( ), followed by successive calls to next( ).

Returns:
Next expense in this list. Null if list is empty, or end of list was reached.
